'''Mythcon 28''' was the twenty-eighth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: The Achievement of His Literary Life"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (Tolkien scholars) and [[Orson Scott Card]] (fantasy author)
*'''Chairman:''' [[Glen GoodKnight]]
